PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-05592007-04-19TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART VII) by allowing commuter operations to conduct visual flight rules operations above a cloud layer and by requiring aircrafts, in both commuter and airline operations, to have an operating means of providing a cockpit indication of the status of the pitot heat system on take-off.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0078 Publication Date: 2007-05-02
AttachmentsAttachment
